attributes.action: Criminalise breaking election promises for public office, no maximum sentence.
attributes.additional_details: To bring honesty back into British Politics. Think and analyse before you shout your mouth off at the electorates expense.
attributes.background: To make Politicians personally liable for their public statements and put no limit on the legal recourse should any political figure make promises then U-turn as soon as they assume office. In the real world this is often dealt with in the sales of goods and services act.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/724417
